title: Velouria Cycles Sober Titanium Trail Hardtail
content:
The Sober Titanium is Velouria Cycles hardtail 29er designed for trail riding. Check out the full rundown on the new and improved Sober below.

The sober is a butted 3Al 2.5V titanium frame that is very absorbent and with very high resistance to fatigue, there is reinforcement at the chainstay yoke with 3D printed in titanium, ISCG05 chain guide, 73mm BSA threaded bottom bracket.

There is internal cable routing to protect the housing, very short seat tubes to be able to fit long-travel adjustable seat posts and derailleur hanger with Sram UDH standard. Now with threads on the frame for anchoring accessories or Velouria Cycles’ specific bag handmade in Alicante (Spain) by DOZ.

Each Velouria Cycles frame is backed by a five-year warranty for the original purchaser. Free shipping to the European Union.

Specs:

  • Four sizes
  • 30-50mm. stem
  • Rear Brake Direct Post Mount 180 mm.
  • Rear wheel axle 148×12.
  • 73mm. BSA threaded bottom bracket.
  • ISCG05 chain guide bracket.
  • 31.6mm. seatpost, 34.9 mm. saddle clamp.
  • Rear tire 29×2.5 max. (on most brands)
  • Compatible with tapered forks using EC44-ZS44 headset.
  • Sram UDH derailleur hanger
  • Rear wheel axle and seat clamp included.
  • 1.795€ – 1.850€

See more at Velouria Cycles.
